property.name: Mohegan Sun
property.description: One of the largest and most impressive casino resorts in the Western Hemisphere. Mohegan Sun features three distinct casinos, over 40 restaurants, world-class entertainment, luxury hotel towers, and a full-service spa. Owned and operated by the Mohegan Tribe of Connecticut, the resort combines modern luxury with the rich cultural heritage of the Mohegan people.

restaurants.name: Todd English's Tuscany
restaurants.description: Celebrity chef Todd English's Italian restaurant featuring handmade pastas, wood-fired pizzas, and classic Italian dishes with a modern twist. Known for its open kitchen and warm Tuscan-inspired decor.

restaurants.name: Bobby Flay's Bar Americain
restaurants.hours: Sunday-Thursday 11:30 AM - 10:00 PM, Friday-Saturday 11:30 AM - 11:00 PM
restaurants.description: Celebrity chef Bobby Flay's American brasserie offering bold flavors inspired by regional American cuisines. Signature dishes include burgers, seafood, and grilled meats with Flay's signature Southwest influences.

restaurants.name: Michael Jordan's Steak House
restaurants.description: Upscale steakhouse by Michael Jordan serving USDA Prime steaks, fresh seafood, and classic sides. Features an extensive wine list and sports memorabilia in an elegant setting.

restaurants.name: SolToro Taqueria & Tequila Bar
restaurants.hours: Daily 11:30 AM - 10:00 PM, Friday-Saturday until 11:00 PM
restaurants.description: Modern Mexican restaurant offering authentic tacos, ceviches, and an extensive tequila and mezcal selection. Features a lively atmosphere with colorful decor.

restaurants.name: Ballo Italian Restaurant
restaurants.description: Contemporary Italian restaurant featuring traditional recipes with a modern presentation. Known for housemade pastas, risottos, and Italian wines.

restaurants.name: Mohegan Sun Buffet (Seasons)
restaurants.description: All-you-can-eat buffet with rotating international stations including seafood, Asian, Italian, American, and carving stations. Special holiday and themed buffet events throughout the year.

restaurants.name: Mohegan Sun Bow & Arrow
restaurants.description: Sports bar and grill with a large selection of beers, wings, burgers, and comfort food. Multiple large-screen TVs for watching live sports events.

restaurants.name: Tao Asian Bistro & Lounge
restaurants.description: Pan-Asian dining experience featuring Chinese, Japanese, and Thai cuisine in a dramatic, stylish setting. Known for its sushi bar, dim sum, and signature cocktails.

restaurants.name: Hash House A Go Go
restaurants.description: Farm-to-table comfort food known for its enormous portions. Famous for twisted farm food including giant pancakes, stuffed burgers, and creative brunch dishes.

restaurants.name: Mohegan Sun Caputo Trattoria
restaurants.description: Casual Italian eatery serving brick-oven pizzas, calzones, pasta dishes, and Italian sandwiches. Family-friendly atmosphere with quick service.

restaurants.name: Frank Pepe's Pizzeria Napoletana
restaurants.hours: Sunday-Thursday 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM, Friday-Saturday 11:00 AM - 11:00 PM
restaurants.description: Legendary New Haven-style apizza (coal-fired thin crust pizza) since 1925. Famous for their white clam pie and classic tomato pies. A Connecticut institution.

restaurants.name: Johnny Rockets
restaurants.description: Classic 1950s-style diner serving burgers, shakes, fries, and other American diner favorites. Fun retro atmosphere.

restaurants.name: Lantern Bar & Grill
restaurants.description: 24-hour restaurant and bar serving a full menu of American favorites including steaks, burgers, salads, and late-night snacks. Perfect for after-show dining.

restaurants.name: Sushi Palace
restaurants.hours: Daily 12:00 PM - 10:00 PM, Friday-Saturday until 11:00 PM
restaurants.description: Fresh sushi, sashimi, and Japanese specialties prepared by skilled sushi chefs. Features an extensive sake menu and omakase options.

restaurants.name: Birdcage Bar
restaurants.description: Upscale cocktail lounge with craft cocktails, premium spirits, and light bar fare. Live DJ and entertainment on weekends.

entertainment.name: Mohegan Sun Arena
entertainment.location: Connected to Casino of the Earth
entertainment.description: World-class arena hosting major concerts, comedy shows, boxing matches, WWE events, and other live entertainment. Has hosted artists including Elton John, Jay-Z, Adele, and many more. Named one of the top entertainment venues in the country.
entertainment.schedule: Events vary; check mohegansun.com/entertainment for schedule

entertainment.name: Wolf Den
entertainment.description: Intimate free live music venue featuring performances from national touring acts, tribute bands, comedians, and local artists. No ticket required â€” shows are complimentary.
entertainment.schedule: Nightly shows, typically at 8:00 PM or 9:00 PM

entertainment.name: Comix Roadhouse
entertainment.description: Premier comedy club featuring nationally touring comedians and up-and-coming talent. Full dinner menu available during shows. Past performers include Kevin Hart, Jim Gaffigan, and Bill Burr.

entertainment.name: The Cabaret Theatre
entertainment.description: Intimate theater venue hosting specialty acts, tribute shows, and smaller concerts. Features comfortable cabaret-style seating with cocktail service.

entertainment.name: Avalon Nightclub
entertainment.description: High-energy nightclub featuring top DJs, themed parties, and special events. State-of-the-art sound and lighting systems. Must be 21+ to enter.
entertainment.schedule: Friday and Saturday nights, 10:00 PM - 2:00 AM

entertainment.name: novelle
entertainment.description: Upscale lounge and nightlife destination featuring craft cocktails, DJ entertainment, and a sophisticated atmosphere. Popular for pre- and post-show gatherings.

entertainment.name: Kids Quest & Cyber Quest
entertainment.description: Kids Quest provides supervised entertainment for children ages 6 weeks to 12 years while parents enjoy the resort. Cyber Quest arcade features the latest video games and attractions for teens and families.

hotel.overview: Mohegan Sun offers two luxury hotel towers with a combined total of approximately 1,600 rooms and suites, providing guests with a full resort experience.

towers.name: Sky Tower
towers.description: The original hotel tower featuring modern luxury rooms with panoramic views of the Thames River valley and surrounding Connecticut countryside.

towers.name: Earth Tower
towers.description: The newest addition to Mohegan Sun, Earth Tower offers contemporary design with cutting-edge amenities and a fresh take on luxury hospitality.

room_types.name: Deluxe Room
room_types.description: Spacious room with king or two queen beds, modern furnishings, and floor-to-ceiling windows. Includes flat-screen TV, mini-fridge, in-room safe, and complimentary Wi-Fi.

room_types.name: Superior Room
room_types.description: Enhanced room with premium bedding, upgraded amenities, and preferred floor location. Features a sitting area and enhanced bathroom with marble finishes.

room_types.name: Junior Suite
room_types.description: Spacious suite with separate living area, king bed, sofa bed, and expanded bathroom with soaking tub. Ideal for extended stays or families.

room_types.name: Executive Suite
room_types.description: Premium suite with separate bedroom and living room, wet bar, dining area, and luxury bathroom with dual vanities and walk-in shower.

room_types.name: Presidential Suite
room_types.description: The ultimate luxury experience with multiple bedrooms, full living and dining areas, private terrace, premium entertainment system, and personalized concierge service.

amenities.name: Mandara Spa
amenities.description: Award-winning spa offering a wide range of treatments including massages, facials, body wraps, and aromatherapy. Features a tranquil relaxation lounge, steam room, and sauna. Treatments draw inspiration from Balinese healing traditions.

amenities.name: Elemis Spa at Earth Tower
amenities.description: Modern spa located in the new Earth Tower offering premium Elemis skincare treatments, couples experiences, and express services for guests on the go.

amenities.name: Indoor Pool
amenities.description: Heated indoor pool with adjacent hot tub, available to hotel guests. Features poolside lounge chairs and towel service.

amenities.name: Fitness Center
amenities.description: State-of-the-art fitness center with cardio equipment, free weights, strength machines, and personal training available. Complimentary for hotel guests.

amenities.name: The Shops at Mohegan Sun
amenities.description: Over 40 retail shops offering fashion, jewelry, accessories, gifts, and specialty items. Features brand-name stores and unique boutiques.

amenities.name: Mohegan Sun Golf Club
amenities.description: Championship 18-hole golf course designed by Graham Cooke & Associates. Located nearby at 100 Golf Club Road, Baltic, CT. Features a pro shop, driving range, and golf instruction.

amenities.name: Wombi Rock Climbing Wall
amenities.description: Indoor rock climbing wall suitable for all skill levels. Located near Kids Quest. Equipment and instruction provided.

gaming.description: Mohegan Sun features three distinct casino areas offering an unparalleled gaming experience. With over 364,000 square feet of gaming space, it is one of the largest casinos in the Western Hemisphere.

areas.name: Casino of the Earth
areas.description: The original casino with a warm, earth-toned design inspired by Mohegan tribal heritage. Features slot machines, table games, and the Bow & Arrow sports bar.

areas.name: Casino of the Sky
areas.description: A soaring, light-filled space with a celestial theme. Home to many of the resort's upscale restaurants and the main high-limit gaming area.

areas.name: Casino of the Wind
areas.description: Features additional slot machines and table games in a dynamic, wind-themed environment.

poker_room_details.name: Mohegan Sun Poker Room
poker_room_details.description: One of the premier poker rooms in the Northeast featuring 33 tables, daily tournaments, and cash games at all stakes. Regular special event series throughout the year.

sportsbook_details.name: FanDuel Sportsbook at Mohegan Sun
sportsbook_details.description: Full-service sportsbook powered by FanDuel featuring a massive LED video wall, individual betting stations, comfortable seating, and full bar service. Offers betting on professional and college sports.
sportsbook_details.hours: Daily, hours vary by sport season

high_limit_areas.description: VIP high-limit gaming areas available for table games and slots with elevated minimum bets, premium drink service, and dedicated hosts.
high_limit_areas.minimum_bets: Vary by game and time of day

promotions.name: Momentum Rewards
promotions.description: Mohegan Sun's official loyalty rewards program. Earn Momentum Points and Tier Credits by playing slots, table games, and poker, as well as through hotel stays, dining, and entertainment purchases. Points can be redeemed for free play, dining, hotel stays, and retail purchases.

tiers.name: Core
tiers.description: Entry level. Earn points on all gaming and resort spending.

tiers.name: Ignite
tiers.description: Earned at 2,500 Tier Credits. Enhanced rewards and select invitations.

tiers.name: Leap
tiers.description: Earned at 10,000 Tier Credits. Priority access, enhanced earning rates, and exclusive events.

tiers.name: Ascend
tiers.description: Earned at 25,000 Tier Credits. Premium benefits including complimentary valet, room upgrades, and dedicated host.

tiers.name: Soar
tiers.description: By invitation only. The highest tier with full VIP treatment, personalized service, and exclusive access to events and amenities.

promotions.how_to_join: Free to join. Sign up at any Momentum Desk, online at mohegansun.com, or through the Mohegan Sun app.

promotions.name: Mohegan Sun App
promotions.description: Download the Mohegan Sun mobile app to manage your Momentum account, view promotions, check your points balance, book hotel rooms, browse restaurant menus, and see upcoming entertainment events. Available on iOS and Android.

promotions.name: Hotel Packages
promotions.description: Various seasonal hotel packages combining room stays with dining credits, spa treatments, or entertainment tickets. Check mohegansun.com/hotel for current offers.

promotions.name: Dining Rewards
promotions.description: Momentum members earn points on all dining purchases at participating Mohegan Sun restaurants. Special dining promotions and discounts available throughout the year.

faq.question: What are the casino hours?
faq.answer: Mohegan Sun's casino is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year.

faq.question: What is the minimum gambling age?
faq.answer: You must be 21 years of age or older to gamble or consume alcohol at Mohegan Sun.

faq.question: Is there free parking?
faq.answer: Yes, Mohegan Sun offers free self-parking in multiple garage locations. Valet parking is also available for a fee.

faq.question: Is there a dress code?
faq.answer: The casino floor has no formal dress code. Upscale restaurants like Todd English's Tuscany and Michael Jordan's Steak House recommend business casual attire. Nightclubs may have specific dress codes.

faq.question: How do I get to Mohegan Sun?
faq.answer: Mohegan Sun is located at 1 Mohegan Sun Boulevard, Uncasville, CT 06382. It is accessible by car via I-395 (Exit 79A). The resort also offers bus service from various cities in the Northeast through Mohegan Sun Express bus packages.

faq.question: Does Mohegan Sun allow smoking?
faq.answer: Connecticut state law prohibits smoking inside public buildings. Mohegan Sun is entirely smoke-free indoors. Designated outdoor smoking areas are available.

faq.question: Is Mohegan Sun pet-friendly?
faq.answer: Select rooms in the hotel towers are designated as pet-friendly. Contact the hotel directly for availability and pet policies, including size restrictions and fees.

faq.question: How do I join the Momentum Rewards program?
faq.answer: Joining is free! Sign up at any Momentum Desk on the casino floor, online at mohegansun.com, or through the Mohegan Sun mobile app. You'll receive your Momentum card immediately.

faq.question: What is the check-in and check-out time?
faq.answer: Standard check-in time is 4:00 PM and check-out time is 11:00 AM. Early check-in and late check-out may be available based on room availability. Momentum members at higher tiers may receive complimentary late check-out.

faq.question: Does Mohegan Sun have a pool?
faq.answer: Yes, Mohegan Sun has a heated indoor pool and hot tub available to hotel guests. The pool area is open daily from 6:00 AM to 10:00 PM.

faq.question: Are there ATMs at Mohegan Sun?
faq.answer: Yes, ATMs are located throughout the casino floor and near the hotel lobbies. Please note that transaction fees may apply.

faq.question: Does Mohegan Sun have a responsible gaming program?
faq.answer: Yes, Mohegan Sun is committed to responsible gaming. The resort provides resources for guests who may need assistance, including self-exclusion options through the Connecticut Department of Mental Health and Addiction Services (DMHAS). For help, call the Connecticut Council on Problem Gambling at 1-888-789-7777 or the national helpline at 1-800-522-4700.

faq.question: Can I host a private event at Mohegan Sun?
faq.answer: Yes, Mohegan Sun offers extensive event and convention space including the Uncas Ballroom, multiple meeting rooms, and the Earth Expo & Convention Center totaling over 275,000 square feet. Contact the events team at mohegansun.com/meetings-events for more information.

faq.question: What other casinos are nearby?
faq.answer: Foxwoods Resort Casino is located approximately 10 miles from Mohegan Sun, also in southeastern Connecticut. Both are tribal casinos operated by different Native American tribes.
